items.title: Turbo Drive
items.description: Turbo Drive accelerates links and form submissions by negating the need for full page reloads.

items.title: Turbo Frames
items.description: Turbo Frames decompose pages into independent contexts, which scope navigation and can be lazily loaded.

items.title: Turbo Streams
items.description: Turbo Streams deliver page changes over WebSocket, SSE or in response to form submissions using just HTML and a set of CRUD-like actions.

items.title: Turbo Native
items.description: Turbo Native lets your majestic monolith form the center of your native iOS and Android apps, with seamless transitions between web and native sections.
